description: 学习以y结尾的名词复数变化：辅音+y变i加es，元音+y直接加s

basic_rules: 以辅音+y结尾，变y为i加-es：baby → babies, city → cities
以元音+y结尾，直接加-s：boy → boys, toy → toys
元音字母：a, e, i, o, u
辅音字母：除了a, e, i, o, u以外的字母
memory_tips: 辅音+y：变y为i加es（辅音需要帮助）
元音+y：直接加s（元音很独立）
记住：辅音需要帮助，元音很独立
common_errors: I have three baby. (错误) → I have three babies. (正确)
The boy are playing. (错误) → The boys are playing. (正确)
I see many city. (错误) → I see many cities. (正确)

sentences: I have one baby. → I have three babies.
The boy is playing. → The boys are playing.
This is a city. → These are cities.
I see a toy. → I see many toys.

templates.question: I see many _____ in the city.
将下列单词按复数变化分类：baby, boy, city, toy, lady, day
templates.answer: 变y为i加es：baby, city, lady；直接加s：boy, toy, day

templates.explanation: 以元音+y结尾，直接加s（这个是对的）

learning_objectives: 掌握以y结尾的名词复数变化规则
能够区分辅音+y和元音+y的变化
了解元音和辅音的概念

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用y结尾规则，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握y结尾规则，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解y结尾规则，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对y结尾规则不熟悉，需要重新学习
